sourcesContent:
export const MainStyles = {
    background: {
        width: '100%',
        height: '100vh',
        zIndex: -1,
        position: 'absolute'
    },
    container: {
        flex: 1,
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center',
    },
    text: {
        fontSize: 18,
        color: '#fff',
        fontFamily: 'Ubuntu_500Medium',
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        fontSize: 64,
        textAlign: 'center',
    },
    textButton: {
        fontFamily: 'Ubuntu_500Medium',
        backgroundColor: '#fff',
        paddingHorizontal: '31%',
        paddingVertical: 'calc(50px / 2)',
        flex: 1,
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center',
        position: 'absolute',
        borderRadius: 30,
        fontSize: 18,
        textTransform: 'uppercase',
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        bottom: 25
    }
}
